metadata.title: CVE-2017-17525 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: guiclient/guiclient.cpp in xTuple PostBooks 4.7.0 does not validate stringsbefore launching the program specified by the BROWSER environment variable,which might allow remote attackers to conduct argument-injection attacksvia a crafted URL.

criterions.comment: postbooks package in bionic is affected and needs fixing.
